title: Enhancing Complex Mathematical Problem-Solving Competencies Through Online Teamwork

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematical knowledge and basic understanding of online collaboration tools
context.additional_context: Team-based problem-solving process leveraging adult learners' diverse experiences. Conducting offline classes in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can foster psychologically safe team environments using online collaboration tools
Learners can design processes for solving complex math problems by applying mixed research methods (quantitative + qualitative)
Learners can strengthen capacities for giving/receiving constructive feedback within teams through iterative feedback cycles
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
